mapper.insert: insert into product (name, sn, costPrice, salePrice, imagePath, intro, brand_id, brandName) values (#{name}, #{sn}, #{costPrice}, #{salePrice}, #{imagePath}, #{intro}, #{brandId}, #{brandName})
mapper.select:
select id, name, sn, costPrice, salePrice, imagePath, intro, brand_id, brandName from product
limit #{start}, #{pageSize}

where.if: and (name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or sn like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
